alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 9:20PM CDT until June 25 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Garland County in central Arkansas... Southwestern Saline County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 919 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hot Springs Village, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Benton... Hot Springs Village... Malvern... Haskell... Mountain Pine... Rockport... Traskwood... Perla... Lonsdale... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Hot Springs National Park... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Magnet Cove... Oaklawn Racetrack... Shaw... Glen Rose... Gulpha Gorge... Owensville... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
